text: Mike Mitchell (born October 18, 1970) is an American movie director, screenwriter, producer, voice actor and animator. He is best known for directing Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo, Surviving Christmas, Sky High, Shrek Forever After, Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked, Trolls and The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part. == Other websites == * Category:1970 births Category:American animators Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters Category:American movie producers Category:American voice actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Oklahoma City Category:Writers from Oklahoma City
title: Mike Mitchell (director)
